thought: To craft a lime banner, I need to dye wool with lime dye. I have no lime dye, but I do have sea pickles which can be smelted into lime dye. Therefore I will smelt a sea pickle in slot 45 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 45 to slot 12 with quantity 1
